# Test Skill

This is a test skill file used to validate the exported JSON schema.

## Usage

This skill demonstrates that the frontmatter schema export works correctly.

## Features

- Valid frontmatter according to Agent Skills spec
- Includes optional fields (license, compatibility, metadata)
- Can be validated using the exported schema
